attributes.action: Enforce people to self-isolate and social distance in their primary residence.
attributes.additional_details: In order to easy the pressure on NHS and primary care services in rural communities where services are already strained.
attributes.background: Enforce people to remain in their primary residence during the COVID-19 outbreak.

rejection.details:
The Government has stated that travelling to second homes is not considered essential travel. You can read the guidance here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/covid-19-essential-travel-guidance

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
